title: Comments: I totally respect the call
text: I totally respect the call for a change of policy, but public opinion that is not subject to debate, is just that, opinion. It has no credibility. Its like an hypothesis without the rigors of debate and testing. M & G is more open to broader-based journalistic inputs and, as such, also open to comment. Why veer away from that? Rather accept that to some extent you have fermented the vitriol and allowed some really tasteless comment, so put it right: develop a policy and if need be we will police it by reporting violations. As Voltaire said, "I may not agree with you, but I defend your right to believe it". We need that spirit to guide this decision.. Thanks for consulting, it can't be an easy decision.
